version_description:
*Added warning when attempting to send text messages to 911
*Bug fixes

- Updated user interface to match iOS7 guidelines
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements
- Support for Google Voice integration in Hangouts
- Requires iOS6 and higher

- Native resolution support for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
- Save message draft when replying
- Support for user's preferred text size system setting
- Accessibility improvements
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

- Fix message timestamp display
- Bug fixes
- Fixes crash in contact picker
Bug fixes
iOS 7/8 bug fixes

Google Voice has been completely redesigned to include the things you care about:
• A new, intuitive layout keeps your calls, text messages, and voicemail organized
• Sign up for a new Google Voice account from the iOS app
• Conversations stay in one continuous thread and support photo sharing and group messaging 
• Support for multiple accounts and improved accessibility
Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Delete an entire message conversation (open a conversation -> press three dots menu -> Delete)
• Access "Do not disturb" more easily, disable the feature in any screen without going to Settings
• Copy voicemail transcriptions and share images from your conversation easily
• Save a tap -- the app will now remember the last tab when being relaunched

We also polished a few things, fixed bugs, and made some performance improvements.

This version:
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Previous version:
• Delete an entire message conversation (open a conversation -> press three dots menu -> Delete)
• Access "Do not disturb" more easily, disable the feature in any screen without going to Settings
• Copy voicemail transcriptions and share images from your conversation easily
• Save a tap -- the app will now remember the last tab when being relaunched

This version:
Enable high contrast mode (no message bubble fill color) in grayscale mode
Reply to messages from notifications

This version:
- Suggested Contacts: quickly call or message your top contacts
- Batch archive entire conversations, calls and voicemails via long-press
- Batch delete individual messages via long-press and tapping select
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Reply to messages from notifications
- Bug fixes
